mapper.select: SELECT SUM(O.SALE_PRICE) AS SUM_SALE_PRICE , COUNT(*) AS SUM_ORDER_CNT FROM TORDER O WHERE date_format(O.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') >= (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT SUM(O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS SUM_CANCEL_PRICE , COUNT(*) AS SUM_CANCEL_CNT FROM TORDER O WHERE date_format(O.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') > (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS002' AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT SUM(O.DISCOUNT_PRICE) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE date_format(O.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') > (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS003' AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS REAL_ORDER_CNT , SUM(O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE FROM TORDER O WHERE date_format(O.ORDER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') > (SELECT OC.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE OC.CLOSE_MONEY IS NULL) AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS003' AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
